detail_desc: Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a gathered yoke at the back and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a gathered yoke at the back and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with an opening and ties.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with an opening and ties.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Wide elastication and gathers around the top and long sleeves with frilled cuffs.

Metal rings in various designs.
Baby Exclusive. Wrapover dressing gown in a soft organic cotton knit with a hood and striped jersey lining.
Baby Exclusive. Wrapover dressing gown in a soft organic cotton knit with a hood and striped jersey lining.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide elastication at the hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and shoulder straps that cross with a knot at the back. A-line and slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket, seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a rounded hem.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with wide lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a photographic print on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Shirt in stretch denim with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. The shirt is in a straight style with a collar, press-studs down the front, two chest pockets, one with a flap and press stud, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening.

Push-up body in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and a half-string back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Shirt in stretch denim with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. The shirt is in a straight style with press-studs down the front, two chest pockets, one with a flap and press stud, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Slightly longer at the back.

Pencil skirt in washed stretch denim with a two-way zip at the front that meets in the middle. Side pockets, back pockets and a coin pocket. Raw-edge hem.

Popover jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip at the top. Kangaroo pocket, zip in one side, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.
